    Since:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void call​(Event event)
      Calls a event, invokes all methods with Subscribe annotation and executes all subscribed Flux's.
      <EventT extends Event>
      Flux<EventT>      		 on​(Class<EventT> eventClass)
      Retrieves a Flux with elements of the given Event type.
      void register​(Object listener)
      Registers a new event listener like the JDA Style by using the Subscribe annotation.
      static EventDispatcher vanilla()
      Creates a new event dispatcher.

      • on

        @Nonnull
<EventT extends Event> Flux<EventT> on​(@Nonnull
                                       Class<EventT> eventClass)
        Retrieves a Flux with elements of the given Event type.
        Type Parameters:
        EventT - the type of the event class
        Parameters:
        eventClass - the event class to obtain events from
        Returns:
        a new Flux with the requested events
